name: Introduction to Probability
description: This course introduces students to the basics of probability, including sample spaces, events, probability mass functions, and more.

name: Discrete Probability
description: This course builds on the basics of probability, introducing students to the fundamentals of discrete probability, including random variables, expectation, and more.

name: Continuous Probability
description: This course introduces students to the fundamentals of continuous probability, including probability density functions, Markov chains, and more.
